verbs.description: [ARG0: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer] [V: announced] [ARG1: a campaign theme focused on corruption in Trump 's Washington] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] .
House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer announced [ARG1: a campaign theme] [V: focused] [ARG2: on corruption in Trump 's Washington] on Monday .
